docs.snippet: Bankrupt coal company Peabody Energy won U.S. court approval on Wednesday for agreements with three states to partially cover $1.14 billion in potential environmental liabilities and for a bonus plan for its six top executives....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bankrupt coal company Peabody Energy won U.S. court approval on Wednesday for agreements with three states to partially cover $1.14 billion in potential environmental liabilities and for a bonus plan for its six top executives.

headline.main: Peabody Gets U.S. Court Approval for Clean-Up Deals, Executive Bonuses
headline.print_headline: Peabody Gets U.S. Court Approval for Clean-Up Deals, Executive Bonuses

docs.snippet: It is not easy fusing a cocktail of genres including music, comedy and time travel into a movie, but the leading stars of new Bollywood film "Baar Baar Dekho" hope to convey a multi-faceted love story....

docs.snippet: "Festival fever" is the name the film industry gives to the inflated reception a movie can experience at a festival, where exuberant audiences and the competition of negotiations can ratchet up a film's hype and price tag. But what can appear a su...
docs.lead_paragraph: "Festival fever" is the name the film industry gives to the inflated reception a movie can experience at a festival, where exuberant audiences and the competition of negotiations can ratchet up a film's hype and price tag. But what can appear a surefire hit in the mountains of Sundance can turn into an expensive headache on the way to theaters.

headline.main: Resurrected Rape Allegations Derail an Oscar Favorite
headline.print_headline: Resurrected Rape Allegations Derail an Oscar Favorite

headline.main: Settlement Reached in Transgender Lawsuit Against Hospital
headline.print_headline: Settlement Reached in Transgender Lawsuit Against Hospital

docs.snippet: Acting president of the Olympic Council of Ireland, William O'Brien, said the body would "defend ourselves to the hilt" after Brazilian police arrested president Pat Hickey in a dawn raid on his hotel on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: Customers say they want to keep the right to sue, and the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has proposed a ban on such moves by banks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Customers say they want to keep the right to sue, and the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has proposed a ban on such moves by banks.
docs.abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column notes large banks are using fine print of checking account agreements to hamper customers' ability to settle disputes in court; questions answered about binding arbitration clauses.

headline.main: More Big Banks Are Using Arbitration to Bar Customer Lawsuits
headline.print_headline: In Fine Print of More Checking Accounts, a Binding Arbitration Clause

docs.snippet: The IOC hierarchy is used to being treated like royalty in Olympic host cities. Brazilian police afforded Patrick Hickey no such deference early Wednesday, bringing a TV crew to film the IOC executive being arrested in a Rio de Janeiro hotel room ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The IOC hierarchy is used to being treated like royalty in Olympic host cities. Brazilian police afforded Patrick Hickey no such deference early Wednesday, bringing a TV crew to film the IOC executive being arrested in a Rio de Janeiro hotel room while naked.

headline.main: Police Case Against IOC Executive Seized Naked by Rio Police
headline.print_headline: Police Case Against IOC Executive Seized Naked by Rio Police
